column1: In order to understand the business nature of these data:
1) Look below Table 1 for the features

2) Alternatively/in addition, Google the string in Row 6 of the the sheet "Downlkoad" (for example, if you paste the string in cell D6 "XAU BGNL Curncy", the Google search shows "Current exchange rate Gold (XAU) to US DOLLAR (USD)")
What you find in the sheet "DownloadBLB" is a raw download from Bloomberg, so you might have to cope with NaNs, different formats, etc

column2: manually tagged: Y=1 if abnormal risk/crisis, Y=0 otherwise
